meanings.definition: The act or state of swelling or becoming swollen.
meanings.sent1: The tumescence of the balloon made it difficult to tie.
meanings.sent2: His ankle showed signs of tumescence after the injury.
meanings.sent3: The tumescence of the marshmallow was comically large.
meanings.sent4: The tumescence of the storm cloud foretold a heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The tumescence of the fruit made it ripe for picking.

meanings.sent1: The tumescence of the river caused flooding in the town.
meanings.sent2: The tumescence of the gland indicated a health issue.
meanings.sent3: The tumescence of the balloon animal was unexpectedly large.
meanings.sent4: The tumescence of the crowd filled the stadium with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The tumescence of the balloon made it float effortlessly.
